Package com.mewna.catnip.entity

Interface Mentionable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationOwner, Member, NewsChannel, Role, TextChannel, User
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationOwnerImpl, MemberImpl, NewsChannelImpl, RoleImpl, TextChannelImpl, UserImpl
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface Mentionable
An entity that can be mentioned. Users, TextChannels, and Members are all examples of mentionable entities.
Since:
2/3/19.
Author:
Nik Ammerlaan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    String asMention()  

  • Method Details

    • asMention

      String asMention()
      Returns:
      A mention for this entity that can be sent in a message.
